MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW8 postcode area of Northwich, affecting properties in Cromwell Road, Appleton Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  11:57AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power loss has been caused by an underground cable fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.19PM on 16th January 2021
